dataList.name: Hunter's Mark
dataList.desc:
Every 3 turns, select a random enemy, reduce their Speed to 1, and target it with all of this unit's Skills
(If this effect could not be activated due to Stagger, activate it next turn)

dataList.name: Undertake Prescript
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was executed this turn, heal 15 SP and gain [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] by ([UnlockBuff_Base] stage + 1) (once per turn)

Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was not executed this turn, gain 1 [PressureOfPrescript] and 5 [KarmaOfIndexStudent]
- If this unit does not have [UnlockBuff_Base], gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] at Turn End
- At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], does not gain [KarmaOfIndexStudent]
- If this unit is under the effect of Effloresced[TabExplain] E.G.O::Procuration, double [KarmaOfIndexStudent] this unit will gain

dataList.name: Unlock
dataList.desc:
Turn End: At 3/6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] or at 90%-/70%-/50%- HP,
- Gain [UnlockBuff_1]/[UnlockBuff_2]/[UnlockBuff_3]
- Heal to 45 SP
- Consume all [PressureOfPrescript] and recover from Stagger
- Gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] in the turn after [UnlockBuff_Base] was gained for the first time

If [UnlockBuff_Base] was gained based on HP conditional above,
- Gain [KarmaOfIndexStudent] by (sum of healed SP / 15)
- Increase [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] to 3/6/9 if this unit had less than 3/6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy]; gain 1 [DefenseDown] and 2 [KarmaOfIndexStudent] next turn for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] Stack gained

Min & Max Speed +10 in the turn this unit uses its powerful attack

dataList.name: Concentration
dataList.desc:
At [UnlockBuff_3], apply the following effects:
- [BlandishmentShinEnemyDelete], gain Shield equal to 50% of max HP (lasts for the rest of this Encounter)
- Intensify [PressureOfPrescript] to [PressureOfPrescript_2nd] and max out its Stack
- Turn Start: Gain 1 [PressureOfPrescript_2nd]
